thread.title: Kelly memo calls for hiring of 5,000 more border agents
thread.title_full: Kelly memo calls for hiring of 5,000 more border agents | Washington Examiner

author: Sarah Westwood
title: Kelly memo calls for hiring of 5,000 more border agents
text:
Homeland Security Secretary John Kelly issued two memos on Tuesday aimed at implementing President Trump 's immigration -related executive orders, which call for strict enforcement of U.S. immigration laws.
Kelly's memos include guidance about where the agency stands in the process of building Trump's border wall and instructions to hire 5,000 additional border patrol agents.
The memos, issued to members of the Department of Homeland Security, explain how officials are to execute Trump's orders.
